name: St. Clare's Quiz | St. Clare's | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the sixth form mistress?
questions.explanation:
Miss Harry.

	Miss Harry takes the sixth form. I think that Pamela Cox, the author of the book, chose the name to be Miss Harry because in 'Fifth Formers of St. Clare's' Miss Theobald asked Mam'zelle to leave Felicity in her bedroom and sleep in Miss Harry's room.

questions.text: What did Daphne buy in the beginning of the book after Pat and Isabel sent Dora inside the train?
questions.explanation:
chocolate.

	Daphne is Dora's twin. They were identical and Daphne was thought to be absent from school. However, both the twins came and did half of everything to play a trick on the school.

Lacey.

	Did this question fool you? Dora and Daphne are twins and of course they have the same surname-Lacey.

questions.text: Who is the girl who worships Alison?
questions.explanation:
Joan.

	Joan, a girl in the first form worships Alison the way Alison worships Sadie, Miss Quentin, Angela and Miss Willcox.

questions.text: What is Miss Willcox's real first name?
questions.explanation:
Doris.

	She changed it to Dedire but the real name in Miss Willcox's case is plane old Doris.

questions.text: In 'The Second form at St. Clare's', what were the names of the two head girls?
questions.explanation:
Anna and Elsie.

	In "The Second Form at St. Clare's" Anna and Elsie (the girls who didn't pass the second form) are made as Head Girls because Miss Theobald thinks that they should learn to be more responisble.

questions.text: How many people including Matron were in the san when the san was on fire?
questions.explanation:
6.

	They were Matron, Queenie, Rita, Erica and two maids.

questions.text: What is the name of the girl who is head girl of the fifth form?
questions.explanation:
Hilary.

	She is the head for the first three books and for the last book which Enid Blyton wrote.

questions.text: In the 'O Sullivan Twins', which first formers did Tessie ask to her party?
questions.explanation:
Isabel, Pat, Janet.

	Tessie was a second former who was celebrating her birthday with a midnight feast in the little music room. She asked three girls from her form and three girls from the first form.

questions.text: What is Angela's mother's first name?
questions.explanation:
Pamela.

	Of course, you find that in 'Claudine at St. Clare's.' Hope you liked my quiz.
